content.prompt: Some scholars have indicated that leopard designs were included on the beaded Aka elephant mask from Cameroon for which of the following reasons?

choices.label: To further advance the divine power of the Fon (king)
To symbolize coexistence within the animal kingdom
To increase the likelihood for a successful hunt
To represent the creative power of the artist

topic.text: 6.3: Theories and Interpretations of African Art

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Describe one or more art historically relevant interpretations of a work of art (or group of related works of art), its reception, or its meaning.
